## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringsaver">StringSaver</a></>}>
Saves strings in the provided stable storage and returns a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> with a stable character pointer. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringsaver/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/uniquestringsaver">UniqueStringSaver</a></>}>
Saves strings in the provided stable storage and returns a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> with a stable character pointer. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/uniquestringsaver/#details">More...</a>

<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Saves strings in the provided stable storage and returns a StringRef with a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// stable character pointer. Saving the same string yields the same StringRef.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compared to StringSaver, it does more work but avoids saving the same string</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// multiple times.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compared to StringPool, it performs fewer allocations but doesn&#39;t support</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// refcounting/deletion.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
